parsed.internal_thinking: After analyzing the board and the initial placements by Alice (Node 20) and Bob (Node 42), I've determined that Node 12 is the most advantageous spot currently available. Node 12 offers a high yield of 11 pips, covering Hex 5 (Brick 6), Hex 2 (Sheep 5), and Hex 6 (Wood 3). This combination provides the essential resources for early-game expansion, specifically for building roads and additional settlements. While it lacks Wheat and Ore, I can prioritize those resources with my second settlement placement, perhaps targeting the eastern side of the board near Hex 7 (Wheat 8) or Hex 15 (Wheat 6). Sharing the highly productive Brick 6 with Alice ensures I keep pace with her development. Node 12 also offers a clear expansion path toward the center of the board via Node 13. [Response was too brief]
parsed.note_to_self: Placed first settlement on Node 12 (B6, S5, W3). Need to secure Wheat and Ore in the second round. Targets: Node 25 (Wh8, S4, O3) or Node 35 (Wh6, S11, O3). Keep an eye on Alice's expansion toward the Brick/Sheep area.
parsed.say_outloud: Hey Alice and Bob! Those are some great spots you've picked. I'm going to set up near the hills and pastures at Node 12. Looking forward to a good game!
